thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 26 of 99
thread.title: Kristyne

author: Kristyne
title: Kristyne
text:
I gave 4 stars instead of 5 due to the fact that I purchased sneakers as a gift that were over $200, when I gifted them in one wear they ripped at the seams on the inside AND on the outside sole. Embarrassed, I contacted SSENSE right away and unfortunately the "best" that could be done was a $35 refund. This was due to the fact that I took too long to contact them... mind you it was the holiday season and I was traveling. I'm glad you did your best to address my problem and offer a solution to it, but as a sneaker connoisseur myself, Y3 sneakers should not tear so easily. ESPECIALLY, after being worn only for 4 hours inside an apartment.
Thank you,
Kristyne
